name: Your Freedom is Worth 100,000$
description:
This was made for the Lame Jam 7: https://itch.io/jam/lame-jam-7

I drew all the art, I voiced the sound effects. 

Music is CC0.

As this is a Lame Jam, I designed the game to be an assault on the senses.... but not too bad. I limited myself to a palette and I think it turned out ok.
